text: Social medias are a huge place to be on the internet, like an icon on the countryside of the web. Communicate with the social media is a mean to socialize without hanging out, to be aware of the actuality, to keep people close. Social medias are a space of expression and diffusion of information where the contents can be personnalized. There is a major place for the social link and the interaction between members.Some social medias are mainly to sharing (photo, videos, music), other are to networking like Linkedin (to create a professional network), other are in the goal to messaging, to publishing, or to collaborating. You have to create your own community on your social media, and to make this community engaged. So, the social media permitte to gain some popularity, a notoriety and a visibility, to keep your e-reputation safe, to communicate, although you’re in movement. Everyone can post on the social medias, the proof is that 3 billion of people use them on the world. The web is an open space, and everything that is posted on the internet is public. Insults, defamation, humiliation, aggression, racist, sexist, homophobic, conspiratorial, Holocaust deniers, the list of undesirable content on the Web is long and growing day by day. Regardless of the form in the end (video, audio, image and text), what is disturbing is the content and the ease with which Internet users have access to these publications. While everyone agrees on the need to curb the proliferation of hate content and "fake news" on the internet, to date, too few concrete solutions have been put in place to counter this worrying phenomenon.
